name: Kaijū
description:
Made in Godot for #LowRezJam2022!

Kaijū is a survival-city-builder where you should build different units  in order to defeat the giant monster destroying your existence.

Optional theme:
You're the last hope

  • Select units with LEFT CLICK
    (To check health & repair)
  • Shop / Repair with RIGHT CLICK
  • Yellow & Red buildings generates money over time!
  • Yellow units damaged can be repaired! (Left click to check)
  • Red building = Tanks & Planes
  • Don't let your BLUE building be destroyed!

Development & Graphics

  • Federico Alvarez

Special Thanks

  • Javier Leal
